org.apache.twill.api.logging

Interface LogThrowable


  • public interface LogThrowable
    Carries Throwable information in a LogEntry.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LogThrowable getCause()
      Returns the cause of this LogThrowable.
      String getClassName()
      Returns the name of the Throwable class.
      String getMessage()
      Returns the message contained inside the Throwable.
      StackTraceElement[] getStackTraces()
      Returns the stack trace of the Throwable.

    • Method Detail

      • getClassName

        String getClassName()
        Returns the name of the Throwable class.

      • getMessage

        String getMessage()
        Returns the message contained inside the Throwable.
        Returns:
        A String message or null if such message is not available.

      • getStackTraces

        StackTraceElement[] getStackTraces()
        Returns the stack trace of the Throwable.

      • getCause

        LogThrowable getCause()
        Returns the cause of this LogThrowable.
        Returns:
        The LogThrowable cause or null if no cause is available.
